Articles.Content:
Strictly speaking this isn't a mod as there's no source code nor any 3d or texture assets being distributed. so I thought this would be the best place for it... if I thought wrong mods please move it to appropriate place.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/l9593336fb8wx2x/mk1CommandSeat.cfg?dl=0

Simple config that combines external command seat and Mk1 pod into a single command part that controls the vessel only when a Kerbal is in the seat. Extra room in the pod is used for EC and Mono, and SNAKS presumably. Just like Jeb always wanted. pic https://i.imgur.com/UIqQvb7.jpg

place anywhere in Gamedata.

Edited May 7, 2016 by nli2work
